sql-statement.sql: SELECT t1.orderItemNo, t2.pName, t2.grade, t2.specification, t1.contractMonth, t2.manufacturer, t2.orderUnit, t1.dsum, t2.ssum, abs(t1.dsum - t2.ssum) AS dssum, t2.price, FORMAT(round(FORMAT(abs((t1.dsum - t2.ssum)),3)*replace(t2.price,',','')),0)as noPirce

FROM ( SELECT orderItemNo,contractMonth, round(SUM(weight), 3) AS dsum FROM b_trading_deliverydetailed where 1 =1 <% if(!isEmpty(orderItemNo)){ %> and orderItemNo like #'%$orderItemNo$%'# <% } %> GROUP BY orderItemNo ) AS t1 LEFT JOIN ( SELECT t.orderItemNo,pName,grade,specification,btm.name AS manufacturer,bto.name AS orderUnit, round(SUM(weight), 3) AS ssum,price FROM b_trading_wiscosettlement t LEFT JOIN b_trading_salesorder p ON LEFT (t.orderItemNo, 8) = p.orderItemNo LEFT JOIN b_trading_manufacturer btm ON p.manufacturer = btm.ids LEFT JOIN b_trading_orderunit bto ON p.orderUnit = bto.ids where 1 =1 <% if(!isEmpty(orderItemNo)){ %> and t.orderItemNo like #'%$orderItemNo$%'# <% } %> <% if(!isEmpty(orderUnit)){ %> and bto.name like #'%$orderUnit$%'# <% } %> GROUP BY t.orderItemNo ) AS t2 ON t1.orderItemNo = T2.orderItemNo WHERE 1 = 1 AND t1.dsum < t2.ssum <% if(!isEmpty(contractMonth)){ %> and t1.contractMonth like #'%$contractMonth$%'# <% } %>

SELECT dd.*, soo.salesOrderNo, soo.salesPrice, bto. NAME AS orderUnit, bto.ids AS orderUnitId, btm.ids AS manufacturerId, btm. NAME AS manufacturer, round(SUM(dd.weight), 3) as sumWeight, round(SUM(dd.gapPrice), 3) as sumGapPrice, round(SUM(dd.dvPrice), 3) as sumDvPrice, poc.pName, poc.grade, poc.thickness, poc.width, poc.length

FROM b_trading_deliverydetailed dd LEFT JOIN b_trading_salesorder soo ON LEFT (dd.orderItemNo, 8) = soo.orderItemNo LEFT JOIN b_trading_planordercomplete poc ON dd.orderItemNo = poc.orderItemNo LEFT JOIN b_trading_manufacturer btm ON soo.manufacturer = btm.ids LEFT JOIN b_trading_orderunit bto ON soo.orderUnit = bto.ids WHERE 1 = 1 <% if(!isEmpty(orderItemNo)){ %> and dd.orderItemNo like #'%$orderItemNo$%'# <% } %> <% if(!isEmpty(orderUnit)){ %> and bto.name like #'%$orderUnit$%'# <% } %> <% if(!isEmpty(manufacturer)){ %> and btm.name like #'%$manufacturer$%'# <% } %> <% if(!isEmpty(orderItemNo)){ %> and dd.orderItemNo like #'%$orderItemNo$%'# <% } %> <% if(!isEmpty(contractMonth)){ %> and dd.contractMonth like #'%$contractMonth$%'# <% } %> GROUP BY dd.orderItemNo
FROM b_trading_payment btp LEFT JOIN b_trading_orderunit bto ON btp.unit = bto.ids WHERE 1 = 1 <% if(!isEmpty(unit)){ %> and btp.unit like #'%$unit$%'# <% } %> ORDER BY sTime ASC
